entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight and ending overnight then clearing. Risk of snow squalls after midnight. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
